title: Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Admission is free. Reservations are not required, but you may wish to confirm the visiting hours with the rector by calling 215-389-1513. Access to the interior of the historic church may be limited during religious services and special events.  Looking for National Park Service passes? The Gloria Dei Church National Historic Site does not issue America the Beautiful passes. Read more about America the Beautiful pass options and issuing agencies.
